comment: 4 hw and 4 tests are the only grades.Lectures cover the easiest versions of questions which do not reflect test questions. Does not use ppt in class. Students who did not attend class outperformed students who did bc they taught themselves. All tests are webcam lockdown. Difficult teaching style and test and hw questions.

Professor roy is a very sweet teacher however i do not believe the grading system is reasonable for the corresponding lectures there were 5 quizzes that were not webcam or lockdown browser however the final exam the weight was 50 percent of your grade with webcam and lockdown browser mentioned no where in the syllabus of the weight of the final.

She speeds through the lectures, and reads from the textbook. Honestly if you've taken a Stat class before, just use your knowledge from that and go through the class. She is very sweet though, and gives everyone a fair chance.

I saw many of her in-person scores were bad, so I can't say much on that, but I took a chance with her online, and seriously a grade booster! Straightforward and easy quizzes and tests. No lockdown and the webcam is great because I'm an anxious tester and hate feeling watched. Overall loved this professor. 10/10 would recommend
NOT AN EASY A do not take, she is a horrible lecturer. messed up info routinely, will NOT help you. You take 5 quizzes and an exam that is 50% of your grade. She does not want you to pass.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Terrible professor. She makes you think the class is going to be an easy A especially since it is only 2 credits but you get graded on like 4-5 quizzes that are worth 10 points then the final is webcam and lockdown worth 50% of your grade so even if you have a 100 in the class and dont do great on the exam you will not do well in the class.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Talks like a mouse you cant hear her half the time and besides that mixes info up a lot. no point in emailing her bc she wont help. dont take. you have 6 grades total, 1 is a final and 5 are quizzes.

I would 100% not recommend this professor if you care about grades or GPA. She has a very heavy accent and the material she teaches is very confusing. He quizzes are unlimited but hard , given the fact that she is an overall bad teacher. The final exam accounts for 50% of your grade with lockdown browser and webcam.

She has a very thick accent which is hard to understand sometimes. She will mess up exams and homework assignments very frequently. The PowerPoint and what she went over in class were very different. Multiple attempts on homework but 2 on the exam.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: This is a class where you have to copy down her notes that she shows in lectures. She gives extra credit for attending class. Homework quizzes have multiple attempts, some exams are lockdown browser but no webcam. She confuses herself at times but she is not too bad. Content is not extremely hard but the way she teaches it can be.

Overall, the class was easy because it mainly consists of online quiz's which have unlimited attempts, also on the three online tests you had two attempts. However, i wasn't a huge fan of the structure of the class, She mainly writes everything on a piece of copy paper that was sometimes hard to read.

Professor Roy is a very nice person and you can tell that she is really trying. However, with that being said she is not a good teacher. Her lectures are disorganized and she rambles. The lecture notes that she writes are illegible. Going to class is not worth it because you don't learn anything. I would not take this professor.

Professor Roy was a nice person but the content was all over the place. She writes on a piece of copy paper in class for notes and no one knew what she was talking about. She is very very sweet don't get me wrong but not my favorite teacher.
Class is super easy- many attempts for quizzes and two attempts per test. Didnt follow the lectures at all but the criteria is super easy compared to my ap Econ class in HS

She is very unknowledgeable, if you ask a question, she will take about 15 minutes and look in the textbook. She has little to no prior knowledge about economics other than current events, which we are not covering. I liked my AP high school teachers better.

We had 4 exams and 5 quizzes. The layout of the online course consists of video lectures, lecture notes, and other tools. The layout is very helpful because you have options to learn the information you want. The practice exams are helpful. Exams and Tests are easy and go based off lessons. Good class  to go at on your own pace.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: If you want an easy A, take her, BUT if you want to learn anything, then don’t. She read off the powerpoint the whole time. Her quizzes are VERY easy, unlimited attempts, no lockdown. As for her final…that was horrible, she didn’t pepare us AT ALL. Her “study guide” was just the name of topics, not what would actually be on the exam.

Terrible. Yeah the test and quizzes are online with no lock down, but horrible teacher. You wont learn anything, youll ask a question and shell tell you your wrong w/o an explanation. She doesnt care about her students. she reads of a powerpoint and acts as if everyone gets it. Easy A, but if you need to learn, you wont learn anything.
Ms. Roy is underrated. Her class is straightforward and relatively easy. She is sweet and a great teacher.

Not the best professor I have had but also not the worst. Her quizzes were due at 8 am on a Sunday, which is a bit odd. Her final also did not make much sense, but the quizzes were unlimited attempts and it was an easy A.

Professor Roy grades upon six quizzes and one final exam. The quizzes are unlimited attempts and the final exam has two attempts, both without lockdown browser or camera. Attendance is not mandatory and all of her lecture materials are posted on D2L. She offers an extra credit opportunity to receive 5 points on your *FINAL* grade.

LISTEN, IGNORE ALL THE BAD REVIEWS. She just has quizzes and the final exam. The quizzes are multiple attempts and she takes the highest grade, one time I had attempted one 35 times lmao. And the final is 2 attempts and ONLINE. and extra credit.

She was actually the worst professor I've ever had. She teaches like a middle schooler giving a presentation in class. This is so rare for me to dislike a professor but she was terrible and slightly rude. Almost impossible to reach outside of class.

If you want an confusingly stressful class, she's for you. Yes, her class looks easy at first but overall: she does not care whatsoever. Grading depends on 6 quizzes + 1 final exam, that's it. If you miss a quiz, you can't retake or make up for it no matter what. She's unreliable when wanting to improve your grade. Hated her and this class.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: SO EASY!!!! attendance is not mandatory and its just online quizzes and tests. extremely lenient if you miss a deadline, she will open it for you. many extra credit opportunities!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Respected

comment: This professor speaks very monotone and reads directly off the PowerPoint and yet still made the material confusing. I didnt understand most of what she was saying and overall wasnt a good class. Wouldnt recommend her.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: Bro if you are at all interested in econ, don't take this woman. Her class is overly hard and she doesn't really teach what the exams are overly hard. Almost everyone fails! DO NOT TAKE! YOU WILL FAIL!!!
